model.storage

Interface IProductGroup

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Warehouse

    public interface IProductGroup
    Interface for handling a group of products.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addProduct(Product product)
      Adds product to the group.
      void deleteProduct(java.lang.String productName)
      Deletes all the product.
      Product findProduct(java.lang.String productName)
      Finds a product based on its name.
      Product removeProduct(java.lang.String productName, int amount)
      Removes an amount of a certain product from the group.

    • Method Detail

      • addProduct

        void addProduct(Product product)
        Adds product to the group.
        Parameters:
        product - the product to be added.

      • removeProduct

        Product removeProduct(java.lang.String productName,
                      int amount)
        Removes an amount of a certain product from the group.
        Parameters:
        productName - name of the product to be removed.
        amount - amount to be removed.
        Returns:
        the removed product.

      • findProduct

        Product findProduct(java.lang.String productName)
        Finds a product based on its name.
        Parameters:
        productName - name of the product to be found.
        Returns:
        the found product.

      • deleteProduct

        void deleteProduct(java.lang.String productName)
        Deletes all the product.
        Parameters:
        productName - the name of the product to be deleted.
